title: An Act relative to advancing the profession of commercial interior design.

abstracts.abstract: Senate, October The committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure to whom was referred the petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 254) of Joan B. Lovely for legislation relative to advance the profession of commercial interior design, report the accompanying bill (Senate, No. 2620).

actions.description: Reported from the committee on Consumer Protection and Professional Licensure
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means
